byline.original: By DHARISHA BASTIANS and GEETA ANAND

lead_paragraph: In pushing officials to investigate the disappearance of thousands after a civil war ended in 2009, hunger strikers won a meeting with the country’s defense minister.
snippet: In pushing officials to investigate the disappearance of thousands after a civil war ended in 2009, hunger strikers won a meeting with the country’s defense minister....

headline.main: ‘Give Us Our Children Back’: Hunger Strikers in Sri Lanka Demand Answers
headline.print_headline: Hunger Strikers in Sri Lanka Demand Answers
